name: Millennium Revelation
text: You can send 1 Divine-Beast monster from your hand to the GY; add 1 "Monster Reborn" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can send this face-up card from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY; this turn, you can Special Summon "The Winged Dragon of Ra" from your GY with "Monster Reborn", ignoring its Summoning conditions, but send it to the GY during the End Phase of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Millennium Revelation" once per turn.
